query.years_5: SELECT news_campaign.created_dt utc, SEC_TO_TIME(TRUNCATE(TIME_TO_SEC(news_campaign.created_dt)/(60*15),0)*(60*15)) reginterval, news_campaign.status status, news_campaign.campaign_type type, news_service.uuid service, count(*) value FROM news_campaign LEFT JOIN news_service ON news_campaign.service_id=news_service.id WHERE news_campaign.status!='deleted'  GROUP BY service, date(utc), reginterval ORDER BY news_campaign.id
query.forever: SELECT news_campaign.created_dt utc, news_campaign.status status, news_campaign.campaign_type type, news_service.uuid service, count(*) value FROM news_campaign LEFT JOIN news_service ON news_campaign.service_id=news_service.id WHERE news_campaign.status!='deleted'  GROUP BY service, date(utc) ORDER BY news_campaign.id

query.years_5: SELECT news_message_sms.created_dt utc, SEC_TO_TIME(TRUNCATE(TIME_TO_SEC(news_message_sms.created_dt)/(60*15),0)*(60*15)) reginterval, news_service.uuid service, campaign_id campaign, message_type type, news_message_sms.status status, count(*) value FROM news_message_sms LEFT JOIN news_service ON news_message_sms.service_id=news_service.id GROUP BY service, campaign, type, status, date(utc), reginterval ORDER BY news_message_sms.id
query.forever: SELECT news_message_sms.created_dt utc, news_service.uuid service, campaign_id campaign, message_type type, news_message_sms.status status, count(*) value FROM news_message_sms LEFT JOIN news_service ON news_message_sms.service_id=news_service.id GROUP BY service, campaign, type, status, date(utc) ORDER BY news_message_sms.id

query.years_5: SELECT news_message_sms.created_dt utc, SEC_TO_TIME(TRUNCATE(TIME_TO_SEC(news_message_sms.created_dt)/(60*15),0)*(60*15)) reginterval, news_service.uuid service, campaign_id campaign, message_type type, news_message_sms.status status, count(*) value FROM news_message_sms LEFT JOIN news_service ON news_message_sms.service_id=news_service.id WHERE news_message_sms.status IN ('delivered','dlr_error') GROUP BY service, campaign, type, status, date(utc), reginterval ORDER BY news_message_sms.id
query.forever: SELECT news_message_sms.created_dt utc, news_service.uuid service, campaign_id campaign, message_type type, news_message_sms.status status, count(*) value FROM news_message_sms LEFT JOIN news_service ON news_message_sms.service_id=news_service.id WHERE news_message_sms.status IN ('delivered','dlr_error') GROUP BY service, campaign, type, status, date(utc) ORDER BY news_message_sms.id

query.years_5: SELECT cds_contact.created_dt utc, SEC_TO_TIME(TRUNCATE(TIME_TO_SEC(cds_contact.created_dt)/(60*15),0)*(60*15)) reginterval, cds_contact.status status, news_service.uuid service, list_id list, count(*) value FROM cds_contact LEFT JOIN news_service ON cds_contact.service_id=news_service.id WHERE cds_contact.status='active' GROUP BY service, list, date(utc), reginterval ORDER BY cds_contact.id
query.forever: SELECT cds_contact.created_dt utc, cds_contact.status status, news_service.uuid service, list_id list, count(*) value FROM cds_contact LEFT JOIN news_service ON cds_contact.service_id=news_service.id WHERE cds_contact.status='active' GROUP BY service, list, date(utc) ORDER BY cds_contact.id

query.years_5: SELECT cds_list.created_dt utc, SEC_TO_TIME(TRUNCATE(TIME_TO_SEC(cds_list.created_dt)/(60*15),0)*(60*15)) reginterval, cds_list.list_status status, news_service.uuid service, count(*) value FROM cds_list LEFT JOIN news_service ON cds_list.service_id=news_service.id WHERE cds_list.list_status='active' GROUP BY service, date(utc), reginterval ORDER BY cds_list.id
query.forever: SELECT cds_list.created_dt utc, cds_list.list_status status, news_service.uuid service, count(*) value FROM cds_list LEFT JOIN news_service ON cds_list.service_id=news_service.id WHERE cds_list.list_status='active' GROUP BY service, date(utc) ORDER BY cds_list.id
